en.purpose: To determines what immunizations/vaccinations are due based on a patient's age.
en.use: To provide a general schedule of vaccination doses.
en.misuse: Not to be used without clinical judgment and knowledge of past vaccinations.

other_details.references: 1. Center for Disease Control and Prevention. (2020). Child and Adolescent Immunization Schedule. Dracunculiasis (guinea-worm disease). Retrieved 2020 September 14 from https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/schedules/hcp/imz/child-adolescent.html

$gt0071|If high risk for any of the following, administer|='Pneumococcal 13-valent conjugate (PCV13)- Pneumococcal polysaccharide (PPSV23) (1 or 2 doses dependent on indication)- Hep A (2 or 3 doses dependent on indication)- Hep B (3 doses)- Meningococcal (MenACWY or MPSV4) (1 or more doses dependent on indication)- Meningococcal B (MenB) (2 or 3 doses dependent on vaccine)- H. flu (Hib) (1 or 3 doses dependent on indication)'
